Section.title: Sections
Section.Paragraph: aurantium audio map files are structured as a sequence of explicitly sized sections. A section consists of a 64-bit identifier i, a 64-bit size value s, followed by s octets of data, followed by zero or more octets of padding such that the next section will begin on a 16 octet boundary. Consumers that do not recognize the identifier of a given section can simply skip the section by seeking forwards by s octets to find the next section.
aurantium audio map files must end with exactly one End section.
Sections should start at offsets that are evenly divisible by 16.
